iree_add_all_subdirs()

option(NL_USE_SERVER "Use NL execution server" OFF)
option(NL_DEBUG "NL Client/server debug level" 0)

if(NL_USE_SERVER)
set(NL_API_CLIENT "../../nonlocal/nl_api_client.c")
else()
set(NL_API_CLIENT "../../nonlocal/nl_api.c")
endif()
